name: Illumine Phase 4
description:
Illumine Phase 4:

Use A and D or Arrow keys to move, and Space to jump. Press the Enter/Return key for cutscenes in-between levels. Avoid obstacles in the levels and collect "light orbs" to increase time on the timer!

Music/Sound Effects: (freemusicarchive.org)

  • "Families" by HoliznaCC0, https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/only-in-the-milky-way-part-3/families
  • "Sense Of Purpose" by HoliznaCC0, https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/spring-at-last-lofi-tape/sense-of-purpose
  • "Transformations" by HoliznaCC0, https://freemusicarchive.org/search/?adv=1&search-genre=Instrumental&music-filter-public-domain=1&page=27
  • "I Feel You" by Soft and Furious, https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Soft_and_Furious/Fluid/Soft_and_Furious_-_Fluid_-_01_I_Feel_You
  • "Missing Person Report" by Holle Mangler, https://freemusicarchive.org/genre/Electronic?sort=date&d=0&pageSize=20&page=13
  • "Hello Michael!" by Loyalty Freak Music, https://freemusicarchive.org/search/?adv=1&search-genre=Instrumental&music-filter-public-domain=1&page=19
  • "Anxiety" by HoliznaCC0, https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/only-in-the-milky-way-part-1/anxiety/
